page.title: 14Home Life in Ballantrae.
page.content: In this mainly agricultural area,few homes have human domestic help.Most own vacuum cleaner,fridge,clothes washing machine and electric iron.Many have long term food freezers and food mixers.Cooking mainly by electricity or butane gas.There are few microwave cookers.Much food is bought canned, frozen or dehydrated,although there is increasing tendency to popularise unprocessed food,especially grains and vegetables and eat less meat.All are well clothed and fed.A few houses have full automatic oil or propane gas central heating.Others have partial central heating from living room coal fire.Personal home safety is largely ignored but household fires must have metal guard where there are young children.Dogs,cats,rabbits,guinea pigs,hamsters,birds,fish are pets.Most houses have gardens and colour TV.
